bibliographic-data.invention-title: VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL SYSTEM AND VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL METHOD OF VEHICLE

abstract.p: If a condition for finishing speed limit control is satisfied, a gradient of a slope of the road is estimated based on a steady component of the longitudinal acceleration of the vehicle, and a correction factor is computed based on the slope gradient of the road, while a target acceleration of the vehicle is computed based on the vehicle speed. Then, a target vehicle speed is computed by adding the target vehicle speed of the last cycle to the product of the correction factor, target acceleration and the cycle time of the control, and the braking or driving force of each wheel is controlled so that the vehicle speed becomes equal to the target vehicle speed. In this manner, a passenger of the vehicle is prevented from feeling uncomfortable about the speed increase after the completion of the vehicle speed limit control.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method of vehicle speed control having vehicle speed limit control and speed increase rate control

nplcit.text: - Oct. 26, 2011 Office Action issued in Japan Patent Application No. 2007-119576 (with partial translation)

abstract.p: If a condition for finishing speed limit control is satisfied, a gradient of a slope of the road is estimated based on a steady component of the longitudinal acceleration of the vehicle, and a correction factor is computed based on the slope gradient of the road, while a target acceleration of the vehicle is computed based on the vehicle speed. Then, a target vehicle speed is computed by adding the target vehicle speed of the last cycle to the product of the correction factor, target acceleration and the cycle time of the control, and the braking or driving force of each wheel is controlled so that the vehicle speed becomes equal to the target vehicle speed. In this manner, a passenger of the vehicle is prevented from feeling uncomfortable about the speed increase after the completion of the vehicle speed limit control.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Vehicle speed control system and vehicle speed control method of vehicle

abstract.p: If a condition for finishing speed limit control is satisfied (step 320), a gradient (Gslope) of a slope of the road is estimated based- on a steady component of the longitudinal acceleration (Gx) of the vehicle (step 330), and a correction factor (Kg) is computed based on the slope gradient (Gslope) of the road (step 340), while a target acceleration (Gxat) of the vehicle is computed based on the vehicle speed (V) (step 350). Then, a target vehicle speed (Vat) is computed by adding the target vehicle speed (Vat(n-l)) of the last cycle to the product of the correction factor (Kg), target acceleration (Gxat) and the cycle time (Tc) of the control (step 360), and the braking or driving force of each wheel is controlled so that the vehicle speed (V) becomes equal to the target vehicle speed (Vat).
In this manner, a passenger of the vehicle is prevented from feeling uncomfortable about the speed increase after the completion of the vehicle speed limit control.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Vehicle speed control system and vehicle speed control method of vehicle

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To prevent an occupant of a vehicle from feeling incongruity in acceleration in accelerating the vehicle after an end of vehicle speed limiting/controlling by varying an acceleration degree in response to a travelling situation of the vehicle in acceleration after the end of the vehicle speed limiting/controlling.

SOLUTION: When an end condition of the vehicle speed limiting/controlling is satisfied (Step 320), an inclination slope Gslope of a travelling road is estimated on the basis of a steady component of a forward/backward acceleration Gx (Step 330), a correction factor Kg is calculated on the basis of the slope Gslope of the travelling road (Step 340), a target acceleration Gxat of the vehicle is calculated on the basis of a vehicle speed V (Step 350), a target speed Vat is calculated as a sum of a product of the factor Kg, the acceleration Gxat, and a cycle time Tc of control by a flowchart shown in Fig.3 and a target speed Vat(n-1) of the vehicle in the cycle (Step 360), and driving/breaking power of each wheel is controlled so that the vehicle speed V reaches the vehicle speed Vat (Step 370).

bibliographic-data.invention-title: VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL SYSTEM AND VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL METHOD OF VEHICLE
SYSTÈME DE COMMANDE DE VITESSE DE VÉHICULE ET PROCÉDÉ DE COMMANDE DE VITESSE DE VÉHICULE

abstract.p: If a condition for finishing speed limit control is satisfied (step 320), a gradient (Gslope) of a slope of the road is estimated based- on a steady component of the longitudinal acceleration (Gx) of the vehicle (step 330), and a correction factor (Kg) is computed based on the slope gradient (Gslope) of the road (step 340), while a target acceleration (Gxat) of the vehicle is computed based on the vehicle speed (V) (step 350). Then, a target vehicle speed (Vat) is computed by adding the target vehicle speed (Vat(n-l)) of the last cycle to the product of the correction factor (Kg), target acceleration (Gxat) and the cycle time (Tc) of the control (step 360), and the braking or driving force of each wheel is controlled so that the vehicle speed (V) becomes equal to the target vehicle speed (Vat).
In this manner, a passenger of the vehicle is prevented from feeling uncomfortable about the speed increase after the completion of the vehicle speed limit control.

La présente invention concerne un procédé selon lequel si une condition pour commander la limite de vitesse finale est remplie (étape 320), un gradient (Gslope) d'une pente de la route est estimé en fonction d'une composante constante de l'accélération longitudinale (Gx) du véhicule (étape 330) et un facteur de correction (Kg) est calculé en fonction du gradient de pente (Gslope) de la route (étape 340), tandis qu'une accélération cible (Gxat) du véhicule est calculée en fonction de la vitesse du véhicule (V) (étape 350).

Ensuite, une vitesse cible de véhicule (Vat) est calculée par l'addition de la vitesse cible de véhicule (Vat(n-l))du dernier cycle au produit du facteur de correction (Kg), de l'accélération cible (Gxat) et la durée de cycle (Tc) de la commande selon l'ordinogramme représenté dans la figure 3 (étape 360), et la force de freinage ou d'entraînement de chaque roue est contrôlée de sorte que la vitesse du véhicule (V) devienne égale à la vitesse cible du véhicule (Vat). Ainsi, on élimine l'inconfort d'un passager du véhicule concernant l'accroissement de la vitesse après la réalisation complète de la commande de vitesse du véhicule.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL SYSTEM AND VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL METHOD OF VEHICLE
SYSTÈME DE COMMANDE DE VITESSE DE VÉHICULE ET PROCÉDÉ DE COMMANDE DE VITESSE DE VÉHICULE

abstract.p: If a condition for finishing speed limit control is satisfied (step 320), a gradient (Gslope) of a slope of the road is estimated based- on a steady component of the longitudinal acceleration (Gx) of the vehicle (step 330), and a correction factor (Kg) is computed based on the slope gradient (Gslope) of the road (step 340), while a target acceleration (Gxat) of the vehicle is computed based on the vehicle speed (V) (step 350). Then, a target vehicle speed (Vat) is computed by adding the target vehicle speed (Vat(n-l)) of the last cycle to the product of the correction factor (Kg), target acceleration (Gxat) and the cycle time (Tc) of the control (step 360), and the braking or driving force of each wheel is controlled so that the vehicle speed (V) becomes equal to the target vehicle speed (Vat).
In this manner, a passenger of the vehicle is prevented from feeling uncomfortable about the speed increase after the completion of the vehicle speed limit control.

La présente invention concerne un procédé selon lequel si une condition pour commander la limite de vitesse finale est remplie (étape 320), un gradient (Gslope) d'une pente de la route est estimé en fonction d'une composante constante de l'accélération longitudinale (Gx) du véhicule (étape 330) et un facteur de correction (Kg) est calculé en fonction du gradient de pente (Gslope) de la route (étape 340), tandis qu'une accélération cible (Gxat) du véhicule est calculée en fonction de la vitesse du véhicule (V) (étape 350).

Ensuite, une vitesse cible de véhicule (Vat) est calculée par l'addition de la vitesse cible de véhicule (Vat(n-l))du dernier cycle au produit du facteur de correction (Kg), de l'accélération cible (Gxat) et la durée de cycle (Tc) de la commande selon l'ordinogramme représenté dans la figure 3 (étape 360), et la force de freinage ou d'entraînement de chaque roue est contrôlée de sorte que la vitesse du véhicule (V) devienne égale à la vitesse cible du véhicule (Vat). Ainsi, on élimine l'inconfort d'un passager du véhicule concernant l'accroissement de la vitesse après la réalisation complète de la commande de vitesse du véhicule.
